name: Intelligent Apps GmbH
goal: Founded in 2009 in Hamburg, mytaxi is the world's first taxi app, and it allows passengers to hail a taxi in two quick taps. With over 10 million downloads and 120,000 licensed taxi drivers, mytaxi is now the leading taxi e-hailing app in Europe, available in over 70 cities in 11 European countries:  Germany, Ireland, UK, Poland, Spain, Italy, Portugal, Sweden, Austria, Greece and Romania.
interests: Climate Action, Competition, Consumer Affairs, Environment, Information Society, Internal Market, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Transport
euInitiatives: Transport & Mobility, Digital Single Market, Online Platforms, Consumer Protection, Sustainable Transport, Smart Cities.
